name: Full Heal Energy

effect.text: If you play this card from your hand, the Pok√©mon you attach it to is no longer Asleep, Confused, Paralyzed, or Poisoned. Full Heal Energy provides [C] energy. (Doesn't count as a basic Energy card.)

tips: Cures status when played from hand
Moving the Energy doesn't trigger the healing effect

competitiveHistory: Full Heal Energy was part of a cycle of Special Energy cards in Team Rocket that combined Energy with useful effects. While not as universally useful as Rainbow Energy, it provided a way to cure status conditions while also advancing your Energy attachment for the turn.

rulings.ruling: The healing effect only triggers when you play this card from your hand. Moving it doesn't cure status.
Full Heal Energy only provides 1 Colorless Energy.
This card does not count as a basic Energy card when not in play.
